properties.ime: Nacionalni laboratorij za zdravje, okolje in hrano (NLZOH)
properties.ime_ang: National laboratory of health, environment and food
properties.opis: NLZOH je osrednji in največji javnozdravstveni laboratorij, ki deluje na 11 lokacijah po Sloveniji in ima sedež v Mariboru. Na področju mikrobiologije v  Mariboru delujejo trije oddelki: Oddelek za medicinsko mikrobiologijo MB kot Oddelek za analizo živil, vod in drugih vzorcev okolja MB in Oddelek za mikrobiološke raziskave.
properties.opis_ang: NLZOH is a central and biggest laboratory in the public health domain, which operates on 11 different locations across Slovenia and is headquartered in Maribor. In Maribor, we work within 3 micorbiological domains: Section for medicinal microbiology MB as the Section for analysis of consumables, waters and other environmental specimens and Section for microbioogical research.
properties.metodoloske_kompetence: Humana medicinska mikrobiologija   |   Mikrobiološko testiranje hrane, vod in predmetov splošne rabe   |   Sekvenciranje naslednje generacije (različne platforme)   |   Molekularna epidemiologija   |   Eno Zdravje Mikrobiota
properties.metodoloske_kompetence_ang: Medicinal microbiology   |   Microbiological testing of food, waters and other general items   |   Next generation sequencing (multiple platforms)   |   Molecular epidemiology   |   One Health Mikrobiota

properties.ime: Nacionalni laboratorij za zdravje, okolje in hrano (NLZOH)
properties.ime_ang: National laboratory of health, environment and food
properties.opis: NLZOH je osrednji in največji javnozdravstveni laboratorij, ki deluje na 11 lokacijah po Sloveniji in ima sedež v Mariboru. Na področju mikrobiologije v Kopru delujeta dva oddelka: Oddelek za medicinsko mikrobiologijo KP ter Oddelek za analizo živil, vod in drugih vzorcev okolja KP. Izvajajo se analize s področja diagnostične in sanitarne mikrobiologije.
properties.opis_ang: NLZOH is a central and biggest laboratory in the public health domain, which operates on 11 different locations across Slovenia and is headquartered in Maribor. In Koper, we work within 2 microbiological domains: Section for medicinal microbiology KP and Section for analysis of cunsumables, waters and other environmental specimens. We conduct analysis within field of diagnostic and sanitary microbiology.
properties.metodoloske_kompetence: Humana medicinska mikrobiologija | Mikrobiološko testiranje hrane, vod in predmetov splošne rabe
properties.metodoloske_kompetence_ang: Medicinal microbiology | Microbiological testing of food, waters and other general items | Next generation sequencing (multiple platforms) | Molecular epidemiology | One Health Mikrobiota

properties.opis: Inštitut za mikrobiologijo in imunologijo Medicinske fakultete Univerze v Ljubljani (IMI MF UL) je osrednja, največja slovenska ustanova za mikrobiološko in imunološko strokovno zdravstveno, raziskovalno in pedagoško dejavnost. V sodelovanju z Univerzitetnim kliničnim centrom v Ljubljani, Onkološkim inštitutom v Ljubljani in drugimi zdravstvenimi ustanovami v Sloveniji razvija ter povezuje temeljno in klinično mikrobiologijo in imunologijo.
properties.opis_ang: The Institute of Microbiology and Immunology of the Faculty of Medicine of the University of Ljubljana (IMI MF UL) is the central, largest Slovenian institution for microbiological and immunological professional health, research and teaching activities. In cooperation with the University Clinical Center in Ljubljana, the Oncology Institute in Ljubljana and other medical institutions in Slovenia, it develops and connects fundamental and clinical microbiology and immunology.
properties.metodoloske_kompetence: Humana medicinska mikrobiologija | Mikrobiološko testiranje hrane, vod in predmetov splošne rabe
properties.metodoloske_kompetence_ang: Medicinal microbiology | Microbiological testing of food, waters and other general items | Next generation sequencing (multiple platforms) | Molecular epidemiology | One Health Mikrobiota
